original_text: At this time, a man called Simeon was living in Jerusalem. He was a good man and he obeyed God. He had waited a long time to see the special person who would save Israel's people. The Holy Spirit was with him.
korean_text: 예루살렘에 시므온이라 하는 사람이 있으니 이 사람은 의롭고 경건하여 이스라엘의 위로를 기다리는 자라 성령이 그 위에 계시더라

sentences.original_text: At this time, a man called Simeon was living in Jerusalem.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 시몬이라는 한 사람이 예루살렘에 살고 있었습니다.
